source:
%%sql
-- Build high_court_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW high_court_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.apprefno IS NULL
        THEN T4.HighCourtID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                     AS HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
    T1.apprefno                             AS CaseReference, 
    T1.appnum                               AS AppealRefNumber,
    T1.app1                                 AS App1,
    T1.lacode                               AS LPACode,
    T2.LPAID                                AS LPAID,
    T1.appyear                              AS AppYear,
    T1.app3                                 AS App3,
    T1.welsh_office                         AS IsWelshOffice,
    T1.case                                 AS CaseName,
    T1.hc_ref                               AS HCRef,
    T1.la_name                              AS LAName,
    T1.location                             AS CaseLocation,
    T1.date                                 AS HighCourtDate,
    T1. tsd_ref                             AS TSFRef,
    T1.related_reference_s                  AS RelatedReferences,
    T1.inspector                            AS InspectorName,
    T1.pins_group                           AS PinsGroup,
    T1.dir_im                               AS DIROrIM,
    T1.procedure                            AS Procedure,
    T1.legal                                AS Legal,
    T1.date_of_dl                           AS DateOfDL,
    T1.file_to_dir_im                       AS FileToDIROrIMDate,
    T1.ic_to_tsd                            AS ICToTSDDate,
    T1.advice                               AS AdviceDate,
    T1.inst_to_tsd                          AS InstToTSDDate,
    T1.instruct                             AS Instruct,
    T1.consent                              AS ConsentDate,
    T1.date_of_hearing                      AS DateOfHearing,
    T1.outcome                              AS Outcome,
    T1.court                                AS CourtDate,
    T1.transcript                           AS TranscriptDate,
    T1.transcript_number                    AS TranscriptNumber,
    T1.appeal                               AS IsAppeal,
    T1.applicant                            AS Applicant,
    T1.sse_defend                           AS SSEDefend,
    T1.outcome_sse                          AS SSEOutcome,
    T1.date_of_court_order                  AS CourtOrderDate,
    T1.transcript_received                  AS TranscriptReceivedDate,
    T1.house_of_lords                       AS IsHouseOfLords,
    T1.pins_aa                              AS PINSAA,
    T1.outcome2                             AS Outcome2,
    T1.original                             AS IsOriginal,
    T1.costs_to_be_written_off              AS AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    T1.bf                                   AS BF,
    T1.for2                                 AS FOR2,
    T1.appeal_type                          AS AppealType,
    T1.challenge                            AS Challenge,
    T1.claim_date                           AS ClaimDate,
    T1.invoice_date                         AS InvoiceDate,
    T1.debt_recovery_date                   AS DebtRecoveryDate,
    T1.payment_receipt_date                 AS PaymentReceivedDate,
    T1.pco                                  AS IsPCO,
    T1.mp                                   AS IsMP,
    T1.redet                                AS IsRedet,
    T1.area                                 AS CaseArea,
    T1.lawyer                               AS CaseLawyer,
    T1.redet_file                           AS RedetFile,
    T1.redet_minute                         AS RedetMinute,
    T1.costs                                AS CaseCosts,
    T1.status                               AS CaseStatus,
    T1.amount                               AS CaseAmount,
    T1.gl_list                              AS GLList,
    T1.ssma_timestamp                       AS SSMATimeStamp,
    T3.SourceSystemID                       AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)          AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                    AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( 
        IFNULL(T1.apprefno,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.appnum,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.app1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.lacode,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.appyear,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.app3,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.welsh_office,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.case,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.hc_ref,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.la_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.location,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1. tsd_ref,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.related_reference_s,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.inspector,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.pins_group,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.dir_im,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.legal,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_dl,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.file_to_dir_im,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ic_to_tsd,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.advice,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.inst_to_tsd,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.instruct,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.consent,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_hearing,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.outcome,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.court,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.transcript,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.transcript_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.appeal,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.applicant,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.sse_defend,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.outcome_sse,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_of_court_order,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.transcript_received,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.house_of_lords,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.pins_aa,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.outcome2,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.original,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.costs_to_be_written_off,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bf,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.for2,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.appeal_type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.challenge,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.claim_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.invoice_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.debt_recovery_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.payment_receipt_date,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.pco,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.mp,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.redet,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.area,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.lawyer,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.redet_file,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.redet_minute,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.costs,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.amount,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.gl_list,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ssma_timestamp,'.')))     AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                     AS IsActive, 
    T4.IsActive                             AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.high_court T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_dim T2 
    ON  T1.lacode = T2.LPACode AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T3 
    ON  "High Court" = T3.Description AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.high_court_dim T4 
    ON  T1.apprefno = T4.CaseReference AND 
        T4.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.apprefno = T4.CaseReference AND 
                    md5(concat(
                        IFNULL(T1.apprefno,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.appnum,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.app1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.lacode,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.appyear,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.app3,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.welsh_office,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.case,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.hc_ref,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.la_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.location,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1. tsd_ref,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.related_reference_s,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.inspector,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.pins_group,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.dir_im,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.legal,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_of_dl,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.file_to_dir_im,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ic_to_tsd,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.advice,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.inst_to_tsd,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.instruct,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.consent,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_of_hearing,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.outcome,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.court,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.transcript,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.transcript_number,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.appeal,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.applicant,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.sse_defend,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.outcome_sse,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_of_court_order,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.transcript_received,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.house_of_lords,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.pins_aa,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.outcome2,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.original,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.costs_to_be_written_off,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bf,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.for2,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.appeal_type,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.challenge,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.claim_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.invoice_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.debt_recovery_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.payment_receipt_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.pco,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.mp,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.redet,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.area,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.lawyer,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.redet_file,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.redet_minute,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.costs,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.amount,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.gl_list,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ssma_timestamp,'.')))  <> T4.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T4.HighCourtID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.apprefno IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.high_court);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **high_court_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View high_court_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW high_court_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
    CaseReference, 
    AppealRefNumber,
    App1,
    LPACode,
    LPAID,
    AppYear,
    App3,
    IsWelshOffice,
    CaseName,
    HCRef,
    LAName,
    CaseLocation,
    HighCourtDate,
    TSFRef,
    RelatedReferences,
    InspectorName,
    PinsGroup,
    DIROrIM,
    Procedure,
    Legal,
    DateOfDL,
    FileToDIROrIMDate,
    ICToTSDDate,
    AdviceDate,
    InstToTSDDate,
    Instruct,
    ConsentDate,
    DateOfHearing,
    Outcome,
    CourtDate,
    TranscriptDate,
    TranscriptNumber,
    IsAppeal,
    Applicant,
    SSEDefend,
    SSEOutcome,
    CourtOrderDate,
    TranscriptReceivedDate,
    IsHouseOfLords,
    PINSAA,
    Outcome2,
    IsOriginal,
    AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    BF,
    FOR2,
    AppealType,
    Challenge,
    ClaimDate,
    InvoiceDate,
    DebtRecoveryDate,
    PaymentReceivedDate,
    IsPCO,
    IsMP,
    IsRedet,
    CaseArea,
    CaseLawyer,
    RedetFile,
    RedetMinute,
    CaseCosts,
    CaseStatus,
    CaseAmount,
    GLList,
    SSMATimeStamp,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From high_court_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
    CaseReference, 
    AppealRefNumber,
    App1,
    LPACode,
    LPAID,
    AppYear,
    App3,
    IsWelshOffice,
    CaseName,
    HCRef,
    LAName,
    CaseLocation,
    HighCourtDate,
    TSFRef,
    RelatedReferences,
    InspectorName,
    PinsGroup,
    DIROrIM,
    Procedure,
    Legal,
    DateOfDL,
    FileToDIROrIMDate,
    ICToTSDDate,
    AdviceDate,
    InstToTSDDate,
    Instruct,
    ConsentDate,
    DateOfHearing,
    Outcome,
    CourtDate,
    TranscriptDate,
    TranscriptNumber,
    IsAppeal,
    Applicant,
    SSEDefend,
    SSEOutcome,
    CourtOrderDate,
    TranscriptReceivedDate,
    IsHouseOfLords,
    PINSAA,
    Outcome2,
    IsOriginal,
    AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    BF,
    FOR2,
    AppealType,
    Challenge,
    ClaimDate,
    InvoiceDate,
    DebtRecoveryDate,
    PaymentReceivedDate,
    IsPCO,
    IsMP,
    IsRedet,
    CaseArea,
    CaseLawyer,
    RedetFile,
    RedetMinute,
    CaseCosts,
    CaseStatus,
    CaseAmount,
    GLList,
    SSMATimeStamp,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.high_court_dim
WHERE CaseReference IN (SELECT CaseReference FROM high_court_dim_new WHERE HighCourtID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM high_court_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW high_court_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
    CaseReference, 
    AppealRefNumber,
    App1,
    LPACode,
    LPAID,
    AppYear,
    App3,
    IsWelshOffice,
    CaseName,
    HCRef,
    LAName,
    CaseLocation,
    HighCourtDate,
    TSFRef,
    RelatedReferences,
    InspectorName,
    PinsGroup,
    DIROrIM,
    Procedure,
    Legal,
    DateOfDL,
    FileToDIROrIMDate,
    ICToTSDDate,
    AdviceDate,
    InstToTSDDate,
    Instruct,
    ConsentDate,
    DateOfHearing,
    Outcome,
    CourtDate,
    TranscriptDate,
    TranscriptNumber,
    IsAppeal,
    Applicant,
    SSEDefend,
    SSEOutcome,
    CourtOrderDate,
    TranscriptReceivedDate,
    IsHouseOfLords,
    PINSAA,
    Outcome2,
    IsOriginal,
    AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    BF,
    FOR2,
    AppealType,
    Challenge,
    ClaimDate,
    InvoiceDate,
    DebtRecoveryDate,
    PaymentReceivedDate,
    IsPCO,
    IsMP,
    IsRedet,
    CaseArea,
    CaseLawyer,
    RedetFile,
    RedetMinute,
    CaseCosts,
    CaseStatus,
    CaseAmount,
    GLList,
    SSMATimeStamp,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM high_court_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View high_court_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.high_court_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.high_court_dim AS Target
USING high_court_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.HighCourtID = Target.HighCourtID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
        CaseReference, 
        AppealRefNumber,
        App1,
        LPACode,
        LPAID,
        AppYear,
        App3,
        IsWelshOffice,
        CaseName,
        HCRef,
        LAName,
        CaseLocation,
        HighCourtDate,
        TSFRef,
        RelatedReferences,
        InspectorName,
        PinsGroup,
        DIROrIM,
        Procedure,
        Legal,
        DateOfDL,
        FileToDIROrIMDate,
        ICToTSDDate,
        AdviceDate,
        InstToTSDDate,
        Instruct,
        ConsentDate,
        DateOfHearing,
        Outcome,
        CourtDate,
        TranscriptDate,
        TranscriptNumber,
        IsAppeal,
        Applicant,
        SSEDefend,
        SSEOutcome,
        CourtOrderDate,
        TranscriptReceivedDate,
        IsHouseOfLords,
        PINSAA,
        Outcome2,
        IsOriginal,
        AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
        BF,
        FOR2,
        AppealType,
        Challenge,
        ClaimDate,
        InvoiceDate,
        DebtRecoveryDate,
        PaymentReceivedDate,
        IsPCO,
        IsMP,
        IsRedet,
        CaseArea,
        CaseLawyer,
        RedetFile,
        RedetMinute,
        CaseCosts,
        CaseStatus,
        CaseAmount,
        GLList,
        SSMATimeStamp,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.HighCourtID, -- surrogate key
        Source.CaseReference, 
        Source.AppealRefNumber,
        Source.App1,
        Source.LPACode,
        Source.LPAID,
        Source.AppYear,
        Source.App3,
        Source.IsWelshOffice,
        Source.CaseName,
        Source.HCRef,
        Source.LAName,
        Source.CaseLocation,
        Source.HighCourtDate,
        Source.TSFRef,
        Source.RelatedReferences,
        Source.InspectorName,
        Source.PinsGroup,
        Source.DIROrIM,
        Source.Procedure,
        Source.Legal,
        Source.DateOfDL,
        Source.FileToDIROrIMDate,
        Source.ICToTSDDate,
        Source.AdviceDate,
        Source.InstToTSDDate,
        Source.Instruct,
        Source.ConsentDate,
        Source.DateOfHearing,
        Source.Outcome,
        Source.CourtDate,
        Source.TranscriptDate,
        Source.TranscriptNumber,
        Source.IsAppeal,
        Source.Applicant,
        Source.SSEDefend,
        Source.SSEOutcome,
        Source.CourtOrderDate,
        Source.TranscriptReceivedDate,
        Source.IsHouseOfLords,
        Source.PINSAA,
        Source.Outcome2,
        Source.IsOriginal,
        Source.AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
        Source.BF,
        Source.FOR2,
        Source.AppealType,
        Source.Challenge,
        Source.ClaimDate,
        Source.InvoiceDate,
        Source.DebtRecoveryDate,
        Source.PaymentReceivedDate,
        Source.IsPCO,
        Source.IsMP,
        Source.IsRedet,
        Source.CaseArea,
        Source.CaseLawyer,
        Source.RedetFile,
        Source.RedetMinute,
        Source.CaseCosts,
        Source.CaseStatus,
        Source.CaseAmount,
        Source.GLList,
        Source.SSMATimeStamp,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.high_court_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.high_court_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY HighCourtID,CaseReference NULLS LAST) AS HighCourtID, 
    CaseReference, 
    AppealRefNumber,
    App1,
    LPACode,
    LPAID,
    AppYear,
    App3,
    IsWelshOffice,
    CaseName,
    HCRef,
    LAName,
    CaseLocation,
    HighCourtDate,
    TSFRef,
    RelatedReferences,
    InspectorName,
    PinsGroup,
    DIROrIM,
    Procedure,
    Legal,
    DateOfDL,
    FileToDIROrIMDate,
    ICToTSDDate,
    AdviceDate,
    InstToTSDDate,
    Instruct,
    ConsentDate,
    DateOfHearing,
    Outcome,
    CourtDate,
    TranscriptDate,
    TranscriptNumber,
    IsAppeal,
    Applicant,
    SSEDefend,
    SSEOutcome,
    CourtOrderDate,
    TranscriptReceivedDate,
    IsHouseOfLords,
    PINSAA,
    Outcome2,
    IsOriginal,
    AreCostsToBeWrittenOff,
    BF,
    FOR2,
    AppealType,
    Challenge,
    ClaimDate,
    InvoiceDate,
    DebtRecoveryDate,
    PaymentReceivedDate,
    IsPCO,
    IsMP,
    IsRedet,
    CaseArea,
    CaseLawyer,
    RedetFile,
    RedetMinute,
    CaseCosts,
    CaseStatus,
    CaseAmount,
    GLList,
    SSMATimeStamp,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.high_court_dim ;
